Photographer: [Photographer's Name] If the photographer's name is not known please indicate IPPA Staff as the Photographer
label: Israeli artist pioneers new technique in painting pictures literally without paints/ instead of colours he uses seeds - beens, wheat, barley and other grains, and glues them to a backing about two metres in size.
